name: Bloom (itch) (Sanshine7)
description:
A story-driven farming RPG, where the player enters a world of flower inhabitants and helps the world return to its natural bloom with the help of kindness.

 

Taking inspiration from games like Stardew Valley, what draws players to play such RPG’s and simulation games is the world and characters, each with their own story and personality for them to explore.

 

The world is slowly decaying, a virus-like fungi spreads and the player must help the world find the source of the issue and try to fix it.

Demo available for PC & MAC

~*~

Final Project at Bezalel Academy of Art and Design Jerusalem

Guidance - Eric Lerner

Code & Development - Oleg Olinik
